title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.112 - Hydrocyanic acid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.112 - Hydrocyanic acid

State Regulations

Hydrocyanic acid solution is restricted to a maximum
quantity per vehicle of 60 gallons or 1000 pounds gross weight provided, however, such liquid is in inside glass bottles of not over one pound capacity
each for solutions of not over five percent strength, and not over five pounds
capacity each for solutions of not over two percent strength. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
